name: Bischer Technologies
tag_list: it-consulting, managed-services, business-continuity, disaster-recovery, network-implementation, computer
overview:
Innovative and Custom-Designed IT Consulting and Solutions for Small to Medium-Sized Businesses in Metro Detroit.

Bischer Technologies was founded in 2008 to help small and medium-sized businesses in Michigan to get the most out of their business technology. Over the years, Bischer Technologies has helped many businesses relieve their technology worries so they can concentrate on their growth and development.

With two decades of proven experience and technical expertise, Bischer Technologies takes a hands-on approach to every client’s IT planning process. Upon completion of a detailed technological review, client’s IT solution and monthly fees are customized to meet their needs.

Bischer Technologies helps our clients put their focus back on their business, providing a team of experienced engineers who view themselves as an extension of the client’s business. And with help and support available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year, a solution is only a phone call or mouse click away.

Bischer Technologies offers managed IT services, business continuity and disaster recovery, and IT consulting and implementation. With a wide range of customized services available, Bischer Technologies works with their clients to determine the best option.
